attributes.action: After frontline healthcare workers, prioritise their household for vaccinations.
attributes.additional_details: As studies suggest, infection is spread within households. If frontline healthcare workers are constantly exposed to the infection. It is essential to protect the rest of the household through vaccination in order to halt the spread of infection.
attributes.background: I am calling on the government to prioritise vaccinations for households of frontline healthcare workers. Frontline healthcare workers are exposed to the virus in their workplace. There is a risk of bringing the virus to their homes thereby making it easier to spread the virus.
